common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]

error_list.name: product.error_busi
error_list.description: The GTIN code is mandatory, please check and upload again.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no access_token in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no partner_id in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: There is no sign in query.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: cnsc shop not upgraded, can not edit item.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Parameter is not match the constraints, {{.error_info}}.

error_list.name: error_incalid_brand
error_list.description: Brand ID or brand name required

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: all BR tax field should be empty or be filled at same time

error_list.name: error_get_shop_fail
error_list.description: Get shop failed. please try later.

error_list.name: error_busi_add_item_failed
error_list.description: Add item failed. please try later {{.error_info}}.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_repeated_mtsku
error_list.description: A similar product has already been uploaded

error_list.name: error_invalid_price
error_list.description: Invalid price, please use the correct format

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Attribute format is invalid. NCC field only allows Eng Alphanumeric input

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: NCC filed only allows character length less than 50.

error_list.name: error_unlist_item_fail
error_list.description: Please upload your products to UNLIST status. Products will be published automatically by Shopee at the official launch date.

error_list.name: error_invalid_price_for_logistic
error_list.description: Shipping channel cannot be enabled as product price exceeds limit.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_inner
error_list.description: System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: The current item belong to the full FBS or B2C shop, so normal stock must be equal to 0

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.

error_list.name: error_busi_cannot_edit_vsku
error_list.description: Can not use OpenAPI to edit/create VSKU, please connect with your manager

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: The location_id input is not matched the shop's location_id(more/wrong). Please double check.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Lack of location_id, please double check.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Please wait for the holiday mode set then to edit item. Please try later.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Total stock must be more than reserved stock.

error_list.name: error_param_validate
error_list.description: Wholesale cannot be used in this category and attributes.

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Your shop can not use model level dts

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: You do not have right to use seller location_id, please only fill seller_stock filed.

error_list.name: error.param
error_list.description: Can not update item with stock less than reserved stock

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with stock less than reserve stock

error_list.name: error_busi
error_list.description: The merchant/shop has multi warehouse, please input location id

error_list.name: error_auth
error_list.description: Stock should be larger than reserved stock.

error_list.name: error_marshal
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team

error_list.name: error_system_busy
error_list.description: Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.

error_list.name: error_image_unavailable
error_list.description: Image is invalid: single image url length is less than 32.

error_list.name: error_reach_shop_item_limit
error_list.description: Item published item count reaches limit.

error_list.name: error_desc_hash_tag_over_limit
error_list.description: Count of hash tags is more than 18

error_list.name: error_item_name_empty
error_list.description: Item name could not be empty.

error_list.name: error_item_name_is_too_short
error_list.description: Item_name length is less than min limit.

error_list.name: error_title_exceeds_max_length
error_list.description: The length of item_name is bigger than max limit.

error_list.name: error_desc_length_min_limit
error_list.description: Description length is less than the min limit.

error_list.name: error_price_exceed_min_limitt
error_list.description: Original_price is less than min price limit.

error_list.name: error_price_exceed_max_limitt
error_list.description: Original_price is bigger than max price limit.

error_list.name: error_wholesale_price_less_than_ratio_limit
error_list.description: Wholesale price is less than ratio limit.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.

error_list.name: error_category_level
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_category_path_count_limit
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_incalid_category
error_list.description: Category IDs for L1 and L2 do not match.

error_list.name: error_category_dts
error_list.description: The current day_to_ship is bigger than category's max days_to_ship.

error_list.name: error_invalid_category
error_list.description: Category is blocked for CB seller.

error_list.name: error_whole_sale_min_count_incorrect
error_list.description: Interal error, please contact openapi team.

error_list.name: error_whole_sale_price_setting_incorrect
error_list.description: Wholesale price can't more than original price.

Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.","key":"xdtCbTa"},{"name":"tax_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"ncm","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"

Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

","key":"FCAkcBh"},{"name":"same_state_cfop","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)","key":"Qfpfaia"},{"name":"diff_state_cfop","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)","key":"TtQTQBn"},{"name":"csosn","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)","key":"WmfYSnN"},{"name":"origin","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"

Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region).

|0 - National, except for those indicated in codes 3, 4, 5, and 8|
|1 - Foreign: Direct import, except for that indicated in code 6|
|2 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, except for that indicated in code 7|
|3 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 40% and less than or equal to 70%|
|4 - National: Produced in compliance with the basic production processes outlined in the legislations cited in the Agreements|
|5 - National: Goods or products with Import Content less than or equal to 40%|
|6 - Foreign: Direct import, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas|
|7 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas|
|8 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 70%|

","key":"cjDxEYi"},{"name":"cest","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"

Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

","key":"fhkmwHs"},{"name":"measure_unit","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"(BR region)","key":"QirWeXD"},{"description":"

tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

","name":"tax_type","sample":"","type":"int32","required":"False","key":"ckHZNxS"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"pis","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"eGecWJY"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

","name":"cofins","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"azFBQXd"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

","name":"icms_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"MpkewQ"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

","name":"pis_cofins_cst","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"wmChwWC"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

","name":"federal_state_taxes","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"wHfDzpc"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

1: Retailer

2: Manufacturer

","name":"operation_type","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"snPTEJm"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

","name":"ex_tipi","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"TsRPBQX"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

","name":"fci_num","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"kjpkRmN"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

","name":"recopi_num","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"FSWFkrF"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

","name":"additional_info","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"xskYrhB"},{"description":"

Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

","name":"group_item_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"tnBEfxG","children":[{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

","name":"group_qtd","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"GRcpCSd"},{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

","name":"group_unit","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"WsEQDbX"},{"description":"

Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

","name":"group_unit_value","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"pcimJxW"},{"description":"

Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

","name":"original_group_price","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"tFXbHwi"},{"description":"

Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

","name":"group_gtin_sscc","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"GNKGZxn"},{"description":"

Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

","name":"group_grai_gtin_sscc","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"KGRrZmx"}]},{"description":"

[BR region]

7101 - for sales of self-produced goods

7102 - resale of third-party goods

","name":"export_cfop","sample":"7101","type":"string","required":"False","key":"hQXScdi"}],"description":"Tax information","key":"NAcAyXG"},{"name":"complaint_policy","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"warranty_time","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.","key":"CJMeBDr"},{"name":"exclude_entrepreneur_warranty","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"boolean","description":"Whether to exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneurs.If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"","key":"hePXCMM"},{"name":"complaint_address_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"int64","description":" Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.","key":"ReWNXHZ"},{"name":"additional_information","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.","key":"iisWaME"}],"description":"Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.","key":"CEyMrMi"},{"name":"description_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"extended_description","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"field_list","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"field_type","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).","key":"HHTDFpB"},{"name":"text","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.","key":"krcYza"},{"name":"image_info","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object","children":[{"name":"image_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Image id.","key":"GfBcjYk"}],"description":"If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.","key":"CXjEwGh"}],"description":"Field of extended description.","key":"Gecddmx"}],"description":"If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.","key":"HMBEMXi"}],"description":"New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal","key":"hSjYFrH"},{"name":"description_type","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed","key":"iiBHQeE"},{"name":"seller_stock","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"location_id","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"location id","key":"fnsZPiS"},{"name":"stock","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"int32","description":"stock","key":"FKMByJn"}],"description":"

seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

","key":"zdNakHZ"},{"description":"

- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

","name":"gtin_code","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"sbPGydE"},{"description":"

category recommendation service id

","name":"ds_cat_rcmd_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":"False","key":"KzYPnhR"},{"description":"

Promotion Image
Currently only allow one promoton image
You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

","name":"promotion_images","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"EExZGSt","children":[{"description":"

Promotion Image

","name":"image_id_list","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":"False","key":"iaJxbjQ"}]},{"description":"","name":"compatibility_info","sample":"","type":"object","required":"False","key":"WbkRGrf","children":[{"description":"","name":"vehicle_info_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"bHfepFN","children":[{"description":"

ID of the brand.

","name":"brand_id","sample":"1234","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"KrGdbFr"},{"description":"

ID of the model.

","name":"model_id","sample":"2345","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"DhypawY"},{"description":"

ID of the year.

","name":"year_id","sample":"3456","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"rGPyJH"},{"description":"

ID of the version.

","name":"version_id","sample":"4567","type":"int64","required":"False","key":"DzwrQhm"}]}]},{"description":"

Scheduled publish time of this item: 

1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status

2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

","name":"scheduled_publish_time","sample":"1733590920","type":"timestamp","required":"False","key":"hTCSasD"},{"description":"

ID of authorised reseller brand.

update_log_list.content: The request field certification_type has been removed. If this field is still passed in the request, it will be ignored by the system.
